title: Consistent Energies Today
caption: Straightforward field—consistency wins today.
snapshot:
Space Weather Snapshot
Straightforward profile—ordinary variance without big swings. Schumann resonance reads on the lively side at times, matching reports of vivid dreams or restlessness for some. Aurora chances look favorable at higher latitudes—dark skies after local midnight tend to help. Recent notable earthquakes were logged; keep news checks brief if you’re prone to stress. Regional storm/flood alerts are active—check local guidance if you’re in the affected area. Plan a steady rhythm; if you run sensitive, keep a quick breath reset and short movement breaks.
affects:
How it may feel
- Focus/energy: Quieter field—use the clarity for deep tasks.
- Autonomic/HRV: Conditions generally support recovery and coherence practices.
- Sleep: Keep evening light warm and low; usual hygiene works.
- Clinician note: I see steadier HRV and less reactivity for many on days like this.
playbook:
Care notes
- Block 1–2 focus sessions (60–90 min) while the field is steady
- Natural light and movement breaks to reinforce circadian tone
- Hydrate; keep caffeine earlier in the day

pulse.severe_summary: Clusters of severe t-storm / flood alerts active. Check local NWS.
